channel.title: [Office Complex] [public-release beta] Plant physics bug outside freezer room (bm_c1a2c)
channel.description:
In bm_c1a2c: Sometimes when looking at or near a plant, the plant physics/bobble moves with the view model and then freaks out. Here is a video demonstrating the issue: https://web.archive.org/web/20191207213908/https://a.uguu.se/ZiQ7pbrCuWSz_plantcut.mkv
Getpos results: setpos -912.704895 -68.637207 216.031250;setang 6.462408 178.819107 0.000000
Version: Build Label: 100001 # Uniquely identifies each build Network PatchVersion: 100001 # Determines client and server compatibility Protocol version: 24 # High level network protocol version Server version: 100001 Server AppID: 346680 Client version: 100001 Client AppID: 362890
System specs: [https://web.archive.org/web/20191207074941/https://pastebin.com/CRrnzmsS](https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://web.archive.org/web/20191207074941/https://pastebin.com/CRrnzmsS)
Tested with Proton 4.11-9.

item.title: [Office Complex] [public-release beta] Plant physics bug outside freezer room (bm_c1a2c)
item.dc:creator: Yetoo
item.description:
In bm_c1a2c: Sometimes when looking at or near a plant, the plant physics/bobble moves with the view model and then freaks out. Here is a video demonstrating the issue:
